relation.text: read it by JF . IM . Gent . With Allowance . Ro . L'Estrange . London : Printed for D. M. 1677
was intended only for one year
begin with . An account of the sessions before Easter-Term 1676
April the 5th . There were then no fewer than Fifteen men and One woman Convicted
condemned and repriev 'd last Sessions , and now
pleaded guilty to the Indictment , and now
suffer 'd with her . At a Sessions the 28th of June 1676
was convicted : So that she was now
the fate of her Family . At the Sessions Aug. 23
tryed for several Offences , but now
Condemned , a woman of above Forty years
give Bail ( not of his own Party or Gang ) for his good behaviour . At the Sessions 7th of March 1676
obtained Reprieves . The Sessions 25th of April 1677
suffered very penitently on the 13th of June
bring themselves to some such shameful End . The last Sessions in July 1677
was executed on the 18th of July
suffered John Gimbold and Mary Russel , both old incorngible Offenders , and now
